reviewText: I love Raul and loved the trailer so much that i had to buy it, only flaw is that it is non Usa format so i had to watch it on my laptop. its a romantic chic flick and in italian i loved it.
I cant give this movie any reviews due to the fact that it will not play in my dvd/blu ray player.  I can only say that it was delivered promptly.  Very disappointed.

Simptica comedia romntica de factoria italiana. La historia es bonita, y su metraje avanza bien, pero le cuesta de finalizar. Los actores estn bien. Tanto Raoul Bova como Michela Quattrociocche tienen qumica, aunque la diferencia de edad se nota, sobretodo por la manera de comportarse de cada uno. Ahora a esperar para la segunda parte: Scusa ma ti voglio sposare.
